body:
Here's the output from `make`:
```
./wallet/wallet.h:802:9:   required from âvoid wallet::CWallet::WalletLogPrintf(std::string, Params ...) const [with Params = {std::optional<int>}; std::string = std::__cxx11::basic_string<char>]â
wallet/wallet.cpp:2931:44:   required from here
./tinyformat.h:291:9: error: no match for âoperator<<â (operand types are âstd::ostringstreamâ {aka âstd::__cxx11::basic_ostringstream<char>â} and âconst std::optional<int>â)
  291 |     tmp << value;
      |     ~~~~^~~~~~~~
./tinyformat.h:291:9: note: candidate: âoperator<<(int, int)â (built-in)
```
...
```
./wallet/wallet.h:802:9:   required from âvoid wallet::CWallet::WalletLogPrintf(std::string, Params ...) const [with Params = {std::optional<int>}; std::string = std::__cxx11::basic_string<char>]â
wallet/wallet.cpp:2931:44:   required from here
/usr/include/c++/11.1.0/ostream:773:5: error: no type named âtypeâ in âstruct std::enable_if<false, std::basic_ostream<char>&>â
In file included from /usr/include/c++/11.1.0/bits/fs_path.h:39,
                 from /usr/include/c++/11.1.0/filesystem:45,
                 from ./fs.h:11,
                 from ./wallet/wallet.h:10,
                 from wallet/wallet.cpp:6:
./tinyformat.h: In instantiation of âvoid tinyformat::detail::formatTruncated(std::ostream&, const T&, int) [with T = std::optional<int>; std::ostream = std::basic_ostream<char>]â:
./tinyformat.h:355:32:   required from âvoid tinyformat::formatValue(std::ostream&, const char*, const char*, int, const T&) [with T = std::optional<int>; std::ostream = std::basic_ostream<char>]â
./tinyformat.h:543:24:   required from âstatic void tinyformat::detail::FormatArg::formatImpl(std::ostream&, const char*, const char*, int, const void*) [with T = std::optional<int>; std::ostream = std::basic_ostream<char>]â
./tinyformat.h:519:13:   required from âtinyformat::detail::FormatArg::FormatArg(const T&) [with T = std::optional<int>]â
./tinyformat.h:975:32:   required from âtinyformat::detail::FormatListN<N>::FormatListN(const Args& ...) [with Args = {std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >, std::optional<int>}; int N = 2]â
./tinyformat.h:1028:20:   required from âtinyformat::detail::FormatListN<sizeof... (Args)> tinyformat::makeFormatList(const Args& ...) [with Args = {std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >, std::optional<int>}]â
./tinyformat.h:1064:37:   required from âvoid tinyformat::format(std::ostream&, const char*, const Args& ...) [with Args = {std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >, std::optional<int>}; std::ostream = std::basic_ostream<char>]â
./tinyformat.h:1073:11:   required from âstd::string tinyformat::format(const char*, const Args& ...) [with Args = {std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >, std::optional<int>}; std::string = std::__cxx11::basic_string<char>]â
```

Same with `clang`:

```
/usr/bin/../lib64/gcc/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/11.1.0/../../../../include/c++/11.1.0/ostream:276:7: note: candidate function not viable: no known conversion from 'const std::optional<int>' to 'std::basic_ostream<char>::__streambuf_type *' (aka 'basic_streambuf<char, std::char_traits<char>> *') for 1st argument
      operator<<(__streambuf_type* __sb);
      ^
In file included from wallet/wallet.cpp:6:
In file included from ./wallet/wallet.h:10:
In file included from ./fs.h:8:
./tinyformat.h:291:9: error: invalid operands to binary expression ('std::ostringstream' (aka 'basic_ostringstream<char>') and 'const std::optional<int>')
    tmp << value;
    ~~~ ^  ~~~~~
```
title: build: compilation error in `tinyformat.h` on Manjaro Linux
